note.p: Xhosa interpreter and constable. Educated by missionaries. Interpreter and constable in the division of Bedford, Cape Colony, from 1867 or before until 1887 or later. Son of Ngqika (Gaika), a Xhosa chief. Brother of Chief Sandili.

p.hi: Cape of Good Hope general directory

note.p: Correspondence vol. 15, letter from J. P. M. Weale, 7 July 1867
